name: White Port and Peach Cobbler
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup fresh peach slices, plus 1 additional peach slice for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Mix honey well with a teaspoon of hot water and cool. Put the honey syrup, port and peach slices in a cocktail shaker, add 1 1/2 cups of ice and shake vigorously. Pour everything into a highball glass. Garnish with the remaining peach slice.
